Package game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Behaviour
    A factory for creating actions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    The main class for the zombie apocalypse game.
    AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    AttackBehaviour
    A class that generates an AttackAction if the current Actor is standing next to an Actor that they can attack.
    ChantingAction
    Action for MamboMarie to spawn five new zombies
    ChantingBehaviour
    A class that generates ChantingAction for MamboMarie to spawn five new zombies.
    CraftingAction
    Action for player to craft weapons
    Crop
    A crop that starts as a unripe crop and grows into a ripe crop.
    Dirt
    A class that represents bare dirt.
    EatingAction
    Action for human to eat food to be healed.
    EatingBehaviour
    A class that generates a EatAction if the current Actor is carrying food.
    Farmer
    A Farmer.
    FarmerHarvestAction
    Action for farmer to harvest a crop for food.
    Fence
    An impenetrable barrier.
    FertilizeAction
    Action for fertilizing a dirt.
    FertilizeBehaviour
    A class that generates a FertilizeAction if the current Actor is standing on a dirt.
    FollowBehaviour
    A class that figures out a MoveAction that will move the actor one step closer to a target Actor.
    Food
    Food that can be eaten.
    HarvestBehaviour
    A class that generates a FarmerHarvestAction if the current Actor is standing next to a dirt.
    Human
    Class representing an ordinary human.
    HumanPickUpBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickUpAction for human to pick up food
    HuntBehaviour
    Returns a MoveAction that will take the Actor closer to the nearest instance of a target class.
    MamboMarie
    A new type of zombie called Mambo Marie.
    PickUpWeaponBehaviour
    A class that generates a PickUpItemAction if the current Actor is standing on a weapon that can be picked up.
    Plank
    A primitive weapon.
    Player
    Class representing the Player.
    PlayerHarvestAction
    Action for player to harvest a crop for food.
    PortableItem
    Base class for any item that can be picked up and dropped.
    QuitAction
    Action to quit the game voluntarily
    ResurrectableCorpseItem
    Class represening a corpse item which should resurrect as a zombie 10 turns later.
    ShotGun
    A shot gun.
    ShotGunAction
    Abstract class representing a Special Action for shooting with a Shot Gun.
    ShotGunAmmo
    Class representing Ammunition for ShotGun.
    ShotGunFiringNorthAction
    Class for performing shooting action that fires in the North direction.
    ShotGunFiringSouthAction
    Class for performing shooting action that fires in the South direction.
    ShotGunFiringWestAction
    Class for performing shooting action that fires in the West direction.
    ShutGunFiringEastAction
    Class for performing shooting action that fires in the East direction.
    Sniper
    A sniper
    SniperAmmo
    Class representing Ammunition for ShotGun.
    SniperFiringAction  
    SowingAction
    Action for sowing on a dirt.
    SowingBehaviour
    A class that generates a SowingAction if the current Actor is standing next to a dirt.
    Tracker
    Tracker class extends GameMap to keep track whether Mambo Marie exists on the map.
    Tree
    A tree that starts as a sapling and grows into a large tree.
    Vehicle
    A Vehicle.
    WanderBehaviour
    Allows an Actor to wander around at random.
    World2
    Class representing the game world, including the locations of all Actors, the player, and the playing grid.
    Zombie
    A Zombie.
    ZombieActor
    Base class for Actors in the Zombie World
    ZombieArm
    Class representing Zombie leg that can be used as a weapon once dropped to the ground.
    ZombieAttackBehaviour  
    ZombieClub
    A weapon crafted from ZombieArm.
    ZombieLeg
    Class representing a Zombie arm that can be used as a weapon once dropped to the ground.
    ZombieLimb
    Base Class representing Zombie limbs that can be used as a weapon once dropped to the ground.
    ZombieMace
    A weapon that crafted from ZombieLeg.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GunCapability  
    ZombieCapability
